title.bibl: Loxias, Mar. 29, 1913, p. 3 A New Drug Store for the West Side.

div.bibl: Loxias, Mar. 29, 1913, p. 3 A NEW DRUG STORE FOR THE WEST SIDE.

body.p: The well known pharmacist, Mr. Constantine Eutaxopoulos, bought another drug store to serve the needs of the west-side Greek community.
This new addition is located at 522-524 Milwaukee Ave. Undoubtedly the Greek community there will patronize this Greek drug store, which will be under the management of Mr. Eutaxopoulos himself.
